name: Fruit Seller's Caution
description: The sacks of fruits and vegetables are piled in a somewhat haphazard manner, but there is a method to the madness â€” some fruits and vegetables can accelerate the process of decay when next to one another. Separating them, therefore, is key to keeping them suitable for sale for as long as possible.\nOf course, there would be no need for such trivial concerns if business is good.
